page.title: 20THE LIFE & TIMES OF CANNICH
page.content:
The{life style}in Cannich area is fairly typical of life in any country area. The{social life}of the community revolves around the various local clubs and the churches play a very large part in the lives of many of the inhabitants.{Entertainment}is not all "canned" - people enjoy ceilidhs, concerts, Burns Suppers, or anything which involves participation.{Family {life}tends to be close-knit and it is usually only when a younger member is getting married or finds work away from home that they leave the family home.
In a countryside such as this the seasons play a major role - spring, summer, autumn and winter each bringing a different phase of life to the community.
